author: tng
msg: Schema: It shouldn't be a fatal error if the schema is not found.

author: tng
msg: Schema: New method InputSource::get/setIssueFatalErrorIfNotFound to tell the parser whether to issue fatal error or not if cannot find it (the InputSource).  This is required for schema processing as it shouldn't be a fatal error if the schema is not found.
